name: Patient Frog
description:
A game made in about two and half hours for the 193rd TriJam: https://trijam.itch.io/

Controls:

Tap or Click anywhere on the screen to hop

You can either play in the browser or on your phone

If the game won't display in portrait on your mobile device just know that I tried to solve this issue for over an hour. No setting seems to display it correctly on my phone. It might be the device.

The Theme of the jam was Patience. One of the first things that came to my mind was a frog patiently waiting for lilypads to float in front of them so that they can hop onward. I figured this would be one of the few things manageable for me to design within 3 hours.

This game is more a test of patience than it is a game because a lot of the time these lilypads aren't sure which direction they want to go.
